hero.title: TOKYO SOUNDS
hero.subtitle: Fly through Tokyo. Experience AI-generated soundscapes.

about.description: Tokyo Sounds combines photorealistic 3D city visualization with AI-generated music to create an immersive audio-visual journey through Japan's capital.

features.title: 3D Tokyo
features.description: Explore photorealistic 3D Tokyo using Google Maps 3D Tiles

features.title: AI Music
features.description: Real-time AI-generated music that adapts to your location

features.title: Spatial Audio
features.description: Immersive 3D sound that responds to your position

features.title: Generative
features.description: Powered by Google Gemini Lyria for unique soundscapes

cta.title: Ready to Take Flight?
cta.description: Experience Tokyo like never before. Soar through the city and discover unique AI-generated soundscapes.

AboutPage.title: Collected daily sounds of Tokyo into an ASMR site
AboutPage.description: This time, we focused on the charm of Tokyo's sounds. Most sightseeing sites are abundant with visual information, but few services have focused on the 'sound' itself. However, Tokyo has many sounds that can evoke the atmosphere of the city, such as the brake sound of trains, the crossing, announcements, and the voices of shopping streets. We wanted to create a service that allows people living in Tokyo or visiting for sightseeing to experience the city through sound. The concept is Tokyo by Sound. We aim to provide a new experience of exploring Tokyo by traveling with your ears rather than your eyes. We record daily sounds and environmental sounds in Tokyo and combine them with 3D-designed cityscapes to make them more intuitive and enjoyable. This allows a wide range of users, including those who want to experience the atmosphere of Tokyo casually, those who want to know the image of the city before visiting, those who like ASMR and environmental sounds, to enjoy the service.

designConcept.title: Visual Image
designConcept.subtitle: A free journey woven by paper airplanes
designConcept.content: To express the concept of Tokyo by Sound, we adopted paper airplanes as the main visual image. Users become paper airplanes freely dancing in Tokyo's sky, experiencing a sense of freedom, lightness, and comfort.

designConcept.title: Color Design
designConcept.subtitle: Tokyo's story played by warm colors
designConcept.content: In terms of color, we mainly use orange and yellow as the main tones. These are warm colors that can make people feel warmth, tranquility, and comfort, while also symbolizing Tokyo's vitality and passion.

designConcept.title: User Experience
designConcept.subtitle: Immersive exploration experience
designConcept.content: In terms of user experience, we use flight and 3D street scenes as core elements, allowing users to freely explore Tokyo's streets and alleys, achieving an immersive experience as if they were actually there.

techStack.title: Framework
techStack.content: This project adopts Next.js 16 as the overall application framework. This enables server-side rendering and static site generation, achieving fast display and SEO optimization. In addition, we utilize the App Router feature to implement flexible page navigation.

techStack.title: Frontend Development
techStack.content: The frontend UI is mainly built based on the Shadcn UI component library, ensuring unified design and high accessibility. In addition, we use Motion (Framer Motion) to implement animation effects, achieving smooth movements and transition effects during user interactions.

techStack.title: 3D City Visualization
techStack.content: The 3D city landscape integrates Google Maps 3D Tiles API and uses Three.js to recreate high-precision city 3D maps. In addition to the representation of city buildings and terrain, we also implement 3D space effects such as sky, ambient light, and material settings through React Three Fiber. Users can freely move in the virtual Tokyo sky through intuitive operations.

techStack.title: Audio Control
techStack.content: The audio engine was developed in-house, utilizing Tone.js for loading, playback, and control of audio, and Three.js' Positional Audio API for Spatial Audio (directional) playback based on the user's position and each POI (Point of Interest). Additionally, we integrate Google Gemini Lyria Realtime API for real-time AI sound generation, providing an immersive audio experience.

techStack.title: AI Music Generation
techStack.content: We collect the user's current location information and surrounding location attributes in real-time, send them as prompts to Gemini Lyria Realtime API, thereby instantly generating and streaming AI-generated music that matches the atmosphere and characteristics of that area. We also design separate prompts for each area.

techStack.title: AI Chatbot
techStack.content: We integrate Gemini 2.5 Pro and Vercel AI SDK to provide answers to users' questions. In addition, we utilize Google Search API to provide detailed answers to users' questions.

memberList.name: Liu Chiawei
memberList.description: Project management, UI design, frontend development, and AI chatbot development. Responsible for overall policy formulation and progress management.

memberList.name: Hunter Nakagawa
memberList.description: Architect and designer of sound engine, multiplayer, 3D city, AI generation, flight physics, and frontend. Responsible for the implementation of the entire website.

memberList.name: Zeb Khan
memberList.description: Main developer of v1.0. Responsible for 3D scene construction and implementation using Three.js, as well as the representation of 3D spaces running on the web.

memberList.name: Zhong Chenghan
memberList.description: Responsible for the production of 3D models used in the project, including the paper airplane and environmental assets.

memberList.name: Arizono Touya
memberList.description: Responsible for presentations in demonstrations and supports promotional material production.

memberList.name: Li Zebin
memberList.description: Responsible for T-shirt design and promotional graphics.

memberList.name: Li Jianxing
memberList.description: Responsible for recording and organizing environmental sounds captured throughout Tokyo.

memberList.name: Li Sen
memberList.description: Supporting team member contributing to various aspects of the project.

PatchNotesPage.title: Evolution Footprints TOKYOSOUNDS Development Story
PatchNotesPage.description: How has TOKYOSOUNDS evolved? Here, we reveal all the behind-the-scenes of development, including the ingenuity and stories contained in each update, as well as unique new features! Please join us on a journey through the footprints of the past, present, and future.

demoVersions.title: Demo Versions
demoVersions.subtitle: Experience previous versions of Tokyo Sounds

patchNotes.title: Version 0.0.1 - First Step
patchNotes.description: ‚ú®Tokyo Sounds project launched! Started working on 3D city visualization. The journey of dreams starts here!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.0.0 - 3D City Born!
patchNotes.description: üèôÔ∏èA low-polygon 3D city made with Three.js is complete. Simple but cute, your own Tokyo is here!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.1.0 - Multiple Scenes Appear
patchNotes.description: üé¨Added multiple scenes, now you can choose your favorite scene. Enjoy various landscapes!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.2.0 - Camera Freedom
patchNotes.description: üé•Fixed camera operation issues! Just drag with the mouse to view the city from any angle.

patchNotes.title: Version 1.3.0 - Audio System Appears
patchNotes.description: üéµIntroduced a new audio system using Tone.js. A richer and more beautiful world of sound is unfolding!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.3.1 - Spatial Audio More Realistic
patchNotes.description: üëÇVolume and stereo panning are automatically adjusted based on position and distance! Experience an immersive feeling as if you were really there!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.3.2 - Audio Control Added
patchNotes.description: üéõÔ∏èNow you can freely control audio pause and play. Enjoy music at your own pace!

patchNotes.title: Version 1.4 - Quiz Game Appears!
patchNotes.description: üéÆAdded a quiz game system. Answer questions about areas to earn points and advance to the next stage!

patchNotes.title: Version 2.0 - AI Generates Music
patchNotes.description: üéπMega update! AI-generated audio system using Google Lyria AI appears! Based on your current location, AI creates exclusive music for you (referenced the open-source project Space DJ)!

patchNotes.title: Version 2.1 - Fly to the Sky!
patchNotes.description: ‚úàÔ∏èAdded flight simulation system. Fly freely over the city and enjoy Tokyo from a bird's eye view!

patchNotes.title: Version 3.0 - Real 3D Tokyo Appears
patchNotes.description: üóºA more detailed and realistic 3D Tokyo made with Google Tiles API is complete. It creates an illusion as if you were really in Tokyo.

patchNotes.title: Version 3.0.1 - Security Enhanced
patchNotes.description: üîíTo address the security vulnerability 'React2Shell' (CVE-2025-55182), we upgraded Next.js to 16.0.7 and React to 19.2.1. You can now enjoy it safely.

patchNotes.title: Version 3.1 - Day and Night Changes
patchNotes.description: üåÖAdded day and night system. The city's appearance changes according to user selection. From the refreshing morning scenery to the fantastic night lights, experience Tokyo that changes with time!

patchNotes.title: Version 3.2 - Instant Teleportation Possible
patchNotes.description: üöÄAdded location teleportation feature. Instantly move anywhere in the world! Keep exploring new places!

patchNotes.title: Version 3.3 - New UI Design
patchNotes.description: ‚úàÔ∏èReferencing actual aircraft HUD UI design, updated to a more modern and user-friendly UI. Feel like you've become a pilot!

patchNotes.title: Version 3.4 - Multiplayer Support!
patchNotes.description: üë•Added multiplayer system. You can now see other online players within 500 meters around your paper airplane. Not alone, let's enjoy together!

patchNotes.title: Version 3.4.1 - Volume Control Menu Added
patchNotes.description: üîäAdded volume control menu. You can now adjust the volume of AI-generated music and environmental sounds.

patchNotes.title: Version 3.4.2 - UI Update
patchNotes.description: üéûThe location introduction screen has become more cinematic, and wind sounds have been added during flight, allowing you to enjoy the flight experience with unprecedented immersion. Performance has also been further improved.
